actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Law.
Committee on Judiciary requested executive comment from Office of the U.S. Attorney General.
Committee on Judiciary received executive comment from Office of the U.S. Attorney General.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend coverage under provisions of that Act relating to benefits to survivors of certain public safety officers who died in the performance of duty.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize the payment of death benefits to public safety officers who die as the result of extreme exercise or activity sustained in the line of duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend coverage under provisions of that Act relating to benefits to survivors of certain public safety officers who died in the performance of duty.
